price: ߌ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߞߵߊ߬ ߟߐ߲߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߛߌߛߌ ߦߋ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߘߏ߲߰ ߠߊ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߟߊ߲ߞߣߍߡߊ߫ ߟߊ߫
arabic: وَرَبُّكَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تُكِنُّ صُدُورُهُمۡ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: warabbuka yaʿlamu mā tukinnu ṣudūruhum wamā yuʿ'linūna
